page.title: 02EDUCATIONAL PROVISION
page.content:
{Education}
Educational provision in the block is nil ( our own school lies just outside the boundary lines ). There are only two schools within 0.5 km. of the boundary lines. One of these is a primary school and the other an 11-18 secondary school ( OURS! ). It is easy to appreciate from this, therefore that children in the area have a considerable distance to travel to school each day. Since the bus service through the area is poor, many of the children make their way to school by car or by foot.
